name: UpdateSessionRecordingSharing
description:
Refresh session recording sharing status.

Call this tool to refresh or update the sharing status of a session recording for a specified project and recording ID.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique string identifier for the project you want to access. Obtainable via the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: session_recording_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the session recording to update the sharing status for.

parameters.name: session_recording_sharing_data
parameters.description: JSON object to refresh sharing settings, including created_at timestamp, enabled status, access_token, settings, password requirement, and share_passwords.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
